net.tridentsdk.data

Class Position

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.data.Position
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Writable

    public class Position
extends java.lang.Object
implements Writable
    Represents a writable form of a Location

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Position(Location loc)
      Creates a new position based from an existing location

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Position

        public Position(Location loc)
        Creates a new position based from an existing location
        Parameters:
        loc - the location to wrap with writable format

    • Method Detail

      • getLoc

        public Location getLoc()
        Gets the wrapped, original location
        Returns:
        the location passed in by constructor or by setLoc(net.tridentsdk.api.Location)

      • setLoc

        public void setLoc(Location loc)
        Sets the wrapped position

        This does not change the value of already written locations. This is purely for purposes of performance, but removes concurrency.

        Parameters:
        loc - the location to wrap with writable format

      • write

        public void write(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buf)
        Description copied from interface: Writable
        Writes the data contained by the current implementation into serialized form in the provided ByteBuf

        Check the implementation source to see serialization spec

        Specified by:
        write in interface Writable
        Parameters:
        buf - the buffer to write the serialized form to
